data.text: @MfanwyEvans she was a lovely person a vegan ❤️❤️❤️
@BrigitteCavana2 C’est super triste pour tout le monde surtout sa fille c’est trop super triste
@BrigitteCavana2 She sounds like a lovely person.
@BrigitteCavana2 Oh no!  I am so sorry for your loss personally, and the loss of an amazing animal advocate!
@saramacarthur2 Oh nice that she was your friend as well,  about the same 10 years as I started on FB in 2009 and also lost another animal activist Gro Ottensen. 2 gold hearts.💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙
@tandybowyer Thank you dear it was last september 6 months ago Yes the animals lost a great defender and vegan.

@Cdric58694863 C'etait encore beaucoup plus triste pour sa fille de 23 ans et tout les activistes sur facebook on eu un choc.
Puis ca a trainee elle allait mieux et le lendemain elle n'allait plus et c'etait comme ca pendant 1 mois :(
@MfanwyEvans She was very pretty and a heart of gold every night for me it was midnight she would start posting on facebook about the suffering of pigs and cows etc.
@BrigitteCavana2 I am so sorry.  She was very pretty and obviously, a very caring person.
